name: .APPROJ
summary: Learn about .APPROJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an APPROJ file in Atomi ActivePresenter (Windows, Mac). To do so, select ActivePresenter â†’ Open Project.... Then, navigate to and open your APPPROJ file.

You can use ActivePresenter to convert an APPROJ file's contents to the .MP4, .PDF, .HTML, and .PNG formats. To do so, open the file in ActivePresenter, select the Export tab, and then select the appropriate format.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .approj file in Atomi ActivePresenter
images.caption: APPROJ file open in Atomi ActivePresenter
